Selections. 1700
titleStmt.author: King, Henry, 1592-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by the booksellers,

notesStmt.note: Third issue of King's poems, with a spurious title, but without the additional elegies. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
